scripts.start:all_suma: concurrently "npm run start:body" "npm run start:query" "npm run start:path"
scripts.start:all_resta: concurrently "npm run start:resta_body" "npm run start:resta_query" "npm run start:resta_path"
scripts.start:all_multiplicacion: concurrently "npm run start:multiplicacion:body" "npm run start:multiplicacion:query" "npm run start:multiplicacion:path"
scripts.start:all_division: concurrently "npm run start:division:body" "npm run start:division:query" "npm run start:division:path"
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:all_suma" "npm run start:all_resta" "npm run start:all_multiplicacion" "npm run start:all_division"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:body" "npm run dev:query" "npm run dev:path"
